name: Ur-Otyugh
description: The Ur-Otyugh is a large, grotesque creature with a strong physical presence, featuring tentacles for grappling and a maw filled with sharp teeth.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and restrain foes while inflicting a debilitating disease makes it a uniquely formidable threat.
goals: The Ur-Otyugh typically lurks in underground lairs or polluted waters, preying on unwary adventurers.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other aberrations or in filthy, stagnant environments.
environment: Usually found in underground lairs or polluted waters.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores make it effective in grappling and resisting physical effects.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma suggest it can be manipulated in interactions or outsmarted.
attacks: It grapples with its tentacles inflicting both bludgeoning and piercing damage, can slam targets into surfaces, and bites to spread disease.
most_powerful_ability: Mental Fuzz, a psionic attack that can stun nearby creatures, significantly affecting combat dynamics.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 12.
additional_information: Can use Legendary Resistance to negate saving throws twice per day
Swallows foes whole for continuous acid damage
Grapples Medium or smaller creatures effectively
Inflicts ongoing hit point reduction through disease
test_queries: grotesque tentacled monster in polluted waters
large abomination that grapples and diseases
strong underwater creature with psionic attacks
monster with tentacles that can swallow whole
formidable underground foe that inflicts harm
